title: S3 Ep31: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Episode 18 – The Prosecutor's Immunity
itunes:title: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Episode 18 – The Prosecutor's Immunity
description:
November 29, 2018 / Assistant District Attorney John Johnson, the prosecutor in Dennis Perry's case, has sent many defendants to death row. But as a result of how John Johnson prosecuted some of those cases, not all of his convictions are still standing today.

Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions, Patrick Cortes, and Chris Zabriskie.

This episode was sponsored by BodyBoss and Article.

www.BodyBoss.com/Undisclosed 

www.Article.com/Undisclosed 

#undisclosed #freedennisperry
